Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Serenade of Water#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Bow#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #a Small Key#.
